pages.text:
[Page Title: Tru Blues House of Wings - Sports Bar |]

WELCOME

One of Mount Pleasant’s oldest bars with the best chicken wings in town!

EXCITING NEWS!

We have installed a new tap system. We went from 3 beers on draft to now having 10 beers on draft. Come on out!

Weekly food Specials
Mon - meatloaf monday 
Come out and try our Meatloaf special starting at 4 pm
Tues - philly and french dip 
Our Philly and French dip special will be served hot and fresh all day!
Wed - burger 
100% Angus beef burgers served your way all day
thurs - chicken sandwich 
Chicken sandwich special served all day. Your choice of fried or grilled
fri - seafood special 
Seafood special with your choice of Fish or Shrimp, or both
sat/sun - football specials 
Football all day served with specials tailored for game day

Great Food. Great Environment.

As one of Mount Pleasant’s oldest bars, Tru Blue’s prides itself on giving everyone a fun and engaging experience that will keep them coming back. With daily food specials and fun events throughout the month, there is something for everyone to enjoy.
